    • Uses of LifecycleAdapter in org.neo4j.index.internal.gbptree

      Subclasses of LifecycleAdapter in org.neo4j.index.internal.gbptree 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  GroupingRecoveryCleanupWorkCollector
      Runs cleanup work as they're added in GroupingRecoveryCleanupWorkCollector.add(CleanupJob), but the thread that calls GroupingRecoveryCleanupWorkCollector.add(CleanupJob) will not execute them itself.
      class  RecoveryCleanupWorkCollector
      Place to add recovery cleanup work to be done as part of recovery of GBPTree.
      (package private) static class  RecoveryCleanupWorkCollector.IgnoringRecoveryCleanupWorkCollector
      RecoveryCleanupWorkCollector ignoring all CleanupJob added to it.
      (package private) static class  RecoveryCleanupWorkCollector.ImmediateRecoveryCleanupWorkCollector
      RecoveryCleanupWorkCollector which runs added CleanupJob as part of the RecoveryCleanupWorkCollector.ImmediateRecoveryCleanupWorkCollector.add(CleanupJob) call in the caller thread.
